inclusion.criterion: Epilepsy diagnosed for more than 2 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Epilepsy treated for more than 1 year with no change of treatment in the month before the enrolment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Onset of cluster seizure in the 24 hours before enrolment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Affiliation to the French social security
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to tolerate levetiracetam, likely poor compliance
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient taking antiepileptic treatment (benzodiazepine) in addition to current treatment during the last 48h00.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
